data.title: Dinner in Tallahassee
data.text: It was suggested that I go to Andrew's bar and Grill. The food was simply amazing. The setting you can either sit outside on the patio or indoors. We chose to sit out on the patio and there are lights in the trees that made the ambience simply amazing. Our waitress was really good and all the food was delicious. I I recommend this restaurant. I will be back.

data.title: Ok
data.text: Our hotel recommended Andrews.   They have very good happy hour pricing.  We had the Tuna Taco appetizer that was great.  We also had the Chicken Nachos that were nice.  Service was disappointing.  Service personnel was very interested in talking about themselves.   Wouldn't go out of my way to visit here again.

data.title: Outdoor dining under a beautiful magnolia and across from Capital
data.text: Wonderful location for dinner, lunch, late night snacks.  We chose the outside dining.  Friendly service,  good food, just a block from our hotel Doubletree.

data.title: Expensive but good
data.text: Went for dinner on a stay in Tallahassee. Arrived around 7pm and had no trouble getting a table, though the place filled up as the evening went on. Service was good, food was fine, but everything is rather expensive for what it is.

data.title: Quick lunch while at loose ends
data.text:
Stopped in for a bite while I had a moment. I was in Tallahassee for a wedding and my hubby was off with the other guys. Nice sports bar that seems to cater for those flying solo. It actually has a section with 4 tables for one in addition to sitting at the bar.
I ordered the Thai tuna salad and it was actually really good! The salad and tuna were super fresh and the dressing had just the right spice in it! The gin and tonic on the side was passable but hey, it's a sports bar, right?
The waitress was a doll and I enjoyed myself!

data.title: Nothing special
data.text: I read very nice things about this place, but honestly I was bit disappointed. It is neither bad neither good. The lunch buffet what u can expect for a buffet, but I thought it would have been way better than what it actually is. Burgers are good, but again nothing special. I hope they will increase mostly the quality of the food that is almost low. Staff is friendly and prices are correct, bit high for the quality u get but that's bcs it's the downtown, so it's normal.

data.title: Eat outside!!
data.text: Loved this place!! Valet parking out front so convenient. Server was awesome - sweet, quick and knowledgable of the menu. Each item the whole table had was enjoyed! Definitely sit outside under the beautiful lit magnolia tree - the ambiance was great!! Can't wait to return on our visit to Tally at the end of the month.

data.title: Keep coming back.
data.text: This place is located right on the main square for the Tallahassee Friday Night Block Party. It has a typical bar food menu of the usual burgers,  sandwiches, nachos, etc. It is usually pretty crowded on Friday nights. The food is consistent, and we haven't had anything we didn't like.  In the past we have had really great college students for servers. This particular visit we weren't so lucky, and our waitress was obviously not happy to be there.  I would recommend Andrew's for the drinks, food, and prices that are pretty fair. Just hopefully you get one of the good servers.

data.title: Good food!
data.text: Our waitress Sam was super nice and attentive! Thank you Sam. Hubby got the Tally burger and I ordered the Salmon burger. Both were really good! Atmosphere is typical bar with lots of TV around. Valet parking is also offered (small fee) so that was nice. We also ordered the brownie dessert and that was good too. I recommend this restaurant!

data.title: Remember the customers?
data.text: This was a late night stop and I was pleased with the taste of the hot wings and tip dip but the queso was DISGUSTING!! The spinach dip was okay but 1 1/2 for a take out of 2 appetizers is TOO LONG!!

data.title: Dine outside instead of staying inside
data.text: The location of Andrew's is very good. I usually have the pesto chicken sandwich when we go there. I recommend you to sit outside if the weather is not that hot. You'll feel like you are not in Tallahassee. We would go there more often if it is less expensive.

data.title: Everyting pretty slapdash tonight
data.text: We had eggplant sandwich. No tomato sauce, really dry. It's a nice place to sit out, but they sure missed it this time.

data.title: Great brunch
data.text: Went for brunch. Food was very good and great and varied selection for brunch.  Went with large crowd but set up was comfortable and service was good.  Would definitely return for brunch.

data.title: Good food, prices and atmosphere
data.text: Very relaxing atmosphere, in the heart of downtown Tallahassee a block from the Capitol and next to City Hall. Mostly sandwiches a nice lunch buffet, frequented by lobbyists, lawyers, locals, government staffers and politicians. A good place for visitors to Tallahassee to catch a bit of local flavor while seeing the sights. Near the state museum, Supreme Court, Legislature, Governor's office etc.

data.title: A nice meal and good service
data.text: Good food and good service.  A very solid performance.  I did the grilled grouper with crawfish that was nicely prepared.  Nice wine selection to boot.

data.title: Late evening outside dining
data.text: I like being outside when sun goes down and it s cooler. The server was excellent checking on us but not overly doing it.The food came to us hot and very good .I would for sure go there again it was a pleasant experience.

data.title: Great food, atmosphere, & service
data.text: Didn't expect to find this great restautrant in a quiet downtown area. Plenty of seating (indoors and patio) and televisions to watch sporting events. They have the best sweet potatoes fries!! Everyone in my family loved their order: burgers, seafood, and black bean wrap. You can't go wrong here. Leave plenty of room for dessert. When you finish, walk around the block and capture a shot of this awesome mural on West College Avenue.

data.title: fun in the City
data.text: Great place to eat and have fun while doing it. I love sitting at a table out side by the big oak tree, whether its at lunch or dinner under the lights. You can enjoy an excellent meal and people watch. The staff are all very nice and if you need help deciding on what to order they are great with their insight.

data.title: Very nice restaurant Downtown.
data.text: Visited with friends on a Thursday night. The service was very prompt and efficient. All the entrees were delivered as ordered and everyone liked their meals. Drinks were not too pricey as in some restaurants . Overall very nice and would return in the area again.

data.title: Reasonable price for a very good brunch!
data.text: WE came for brunch and we paid U$ 17 for a great selection of things to eat,like grits,benedicts,fresh fruits,roastbeef,and so on!IWaiters were nice,and the food good!It was a Sunday brunch!
